result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert L Arbelius was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant granted payment plan of $50 per mo commencing 8/1/2016 for fine/court costs/attorney fees. Failure to pay fine/court costs may result in a commitment of -1- day for every $25 owed. Failure to pay attorney fees may result in a civil judgment being entered.
Defendant to submit a DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned plea hearing on July 13, 2016 at 08:45 am.

Defendant Robert L Arbelius in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant requests court appointed counsel. Court will appoint counsel for defendant. Court orders defendant pay $100 per month toward attorney fees commencing 7/1/2016. Bail to continue.  Adjourned plea hearing scheduled for July 13, 2016 at 08:45 am.
Adjourned plea hearing on June 15, 2016 at 08:45 am.

Defendant Robert L Arbelius in court.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant advised of complaint/penalties thereof. Defendant stated he is not eligible for the public defender, will consult with a private attorney. Bail to continue.  Adjourned plea hearing scheduled for June 15, 2016 at 08:45 am.
Copy of bail bond faxed to Milwaukee County Secure Detention for defendant's signature.
w/condition: not operate m/v without valid driver's license.
Plea hearing on May 31, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Robert L Arbelius in court, in custody.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant requested hearing on return of warrant/initial appearance.
